content.rendered:
Directed by David Hollander. Damian Marcano. Gregg Araki. Natasha Braier. Cheryl Dunye. Tucker Gates.

Written by David Hollander. David Hollander. Paul Schrader. Paul Schrader. Walter Blount. Alye Miller. Jay Beattie. Cami Delavigne. Dan Dworkin. Emily Kaczmarek. David Bar Katz. Russell Rothberg. Nikki Toscano. Neil LaBute.

Cast Gretchen Mol (Michelle Stratton). Lizzie BrocherÃ© (Isabelle Desnain). Gabriel LaBelle (Colin Stratton). Leland Orser (Richard Stratton). Rosie O’Donnell (Detective Sunday). Alex Fernandez (Eduard Panish). Wayne Brady (Lorenzo). Laura Liguori (Elizabeth ShannonHouse). Yolonda Ross (Lizzy). Mark Mahoney (McGregor). Sandrine Holt (Olga Desnain). FranÃ§ois Chau (Don Clyborne). Harlow Happy Hexum (Young Isabelle). Melora Walters (Maryanne Henderson). Heather McComb (Rachel). Melinna Bobadilla (Paloma Aguilar). Chelsea Edmundson (Janet Holmes). Taylor Blackwell (Lisa Beck). Justin Huen (Detective Lopez). Ric Sarabia (Fausto). Jennifer Schwary (Green-Eyed Woman). Jay Washington (Luther). Shaun J. Brown (Chris Shannonhouse). Leigh Taylor-Young (Gail St. John). Patrick Fischler (Theodore Banks). Erik Adkins (Detective Young). Kelli Garner (Claire). Alejandra Flores (Luciana). Judah Mackey (Young Colin). Jay Alan Christianson (Kevin Finnegan). Mark Mahoney (McGregor).

Language English.

Producers Daniel Rodriguez. Pavlina Hatoupis. David Bar Katz. Aaron Moskal. Marina Dompke. Matt Barber. Jerry Bruckheimer. David Hollander. Jonathan Littman. Emma Ludbrook. KristieAnne Reed. Russell Rothberg. Nikki Toscano. Cami Delavigne. Lou Fusaro. Emily Kaczmarek. Jared Leto.

Production Paramount Television. Jerry Bruckheimer Television. Showtime Networks.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 8

Status Finished (4)
